title: Ashlin Barry 2nd, Enzo Hincapie Forced to Run Final 2km to Finish Paris-Roubaix Junior
content:
Another top ride from Ashlin Barry, while Enzo Hincapie was forced to run the final 2km in Paris-Roubaix Junior after suffering a mechanical.

Read the full article at Ashlin Barry 2nd, Enzo Hincapie Forced to Run Final 2km to Finish Paris-Roubaix Junior on Velo.
author: ahood
